publ: by Gomathy Shankaran (DBA Kidz Learn Applications)
name: LanguageTranslate
0:
”Alexa, open language translate”
”translate hello in French”
”help”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: language translate
Developer Terms of Use
des: Language Translate - an Alexa skill to translate words or sentences from English to 'Portuguese', 'German','French', 'Latin' or 'Spanish'. Language Translate skill uses Open AI services to translate the words, texts or sentences from English in to the list of languages available above. You can start translating text by starting the word or sentence with translate and end the sentence with the language you want it to be translated in to.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
